title: Frontline : The search for truth in wartime
creator_credit: Central Independent Television (UK), Nicholas Claxton and Ross Devenish
brief_description: In this fascinating documentary, distinguished Australian war correspondent John Pilger traces the changing face of war reporting from Crimea through the First and Second World Wars to Vietnam and the Falklands.
